##8.3.1
Preview Carseats data.
```{r}
head(Carseats)
attach(Carseats)
```

Create predictor High and add to Carseats.
```{r}
High <- ifelse(Sales<=8, 'No', 'Yes')

Carseats %>%
    mutate(High) %>%
    head

```

```{r}
carseats_tree = tree(High ~ . - Sales, data=Carseats)
summary(carseats_tree)
```
